title: Heaven Defying Dark Empress - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Josei   Romance   Supernatural   Xianxia
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Cultivation   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Immortals
author: 处雨潇湘
description:
She was famously known as a prodigious genius with miraculous gift in one of China’s military academies. Suffering from the betrayal of her family, she traversed an ancient route through the stars to come here! Kicking up Heaven shaking upheaval with nothing but her bare hands, what kind of brilliant marvels would she stir? 

Staving off evil and overwhelming all paths and ways In this boundless universe, what kind of a legends would be created? >
